1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Bundle of core modules.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core
6  ( -- * Modules
7    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert,
8    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap,
9    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit,
10    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap,
11    module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource,
12  
13    -- * Dependencies
14    -- $ModuleDependency
15  ) where
16
17import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Assert
18import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap
19import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relkit
20import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Relmap
21import Koshucode.Baala.Core.Resource
22
23
24-- ----------------------
25-- $ModuleDependency
26--
27-- * @[Core]@ module is a union of
28--   @Resource@,
29--   @Assert@,
30--   @Relmap@, and
31--   @Content@ modules.
32--
33-- * @Resource@ module uses
34--   @Assert@,
35--   @Relmap@,
36--   @Content@, and
37--   @[Base]@ modules.
38--
39-- * @Assert@ module uses
40--   @Relmap@,
41--   @Content@, and
42--   @[Base]@ modules.
43--
44-- * @Relmap@ module uses
45--   @Content@, and
46--   @[Base]@ modules.
47--
48-- * @Content@ module uses
49--   @Data@, and
50--   @[Base]@ modules.
51--
52-- * @[Base]@ module is a union of
53--   @Data@,
54--   @Abort@,
55--   @Syntax@, and
56--   @Prelude@ modules.
57--
58-- * @Abort@ module uses
59--   @Syntax@ and
60--   @Prelude@ modules.
61--
62-- * @Syntax@ module uses
63--   @Prelude@ module.
64--
65-- * @Data@ module uses
66--   @Prelude@ module.
67--
68-- * @Prelude@ module uses
69--   no modules in Koshucode.
70--
71-- Following picture shows reduced dependencies.
72--
73-- @
74--      [Core]             [Base]
75--        |                /    \\
76--     Resource           /     Abort
77--        |              /        |
78--      Assert          Data    Token
79--        |              \\        |
80--      Relmap            \\     Syntax
81--        |                \\     /
82--      Content             Prelude
83--        |
84--      [Base]
85-- @
86--
87
